title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Pre-requisites: NoneClassical cryptology and ShannonÃ¢ÂÂs theory; lock ciphers, substitution ciphers; Analog encryption; Mathematics in cryptology, quotations; Chinese remainder theorem; Prime distribution; Division function systems; Knapsack rapdoor; RSA trapdoor; Electronic signature; Key generation and distribution; Cryptographic protocols and techniques, Scrambled broadcast systems.
